Job Description: Works independently under limited supervision   Overall 10 to 15 years of experience    Minimum 2 Years experience in SAP Analytics Cloud, must have at least one SAC Planning project exp   Hands experience in SAP Analytics Cloud technologies SAC, BODS , BW on HANA , HANA Modelling    Good Knowledge on Live and import data models functionality   MUST have SAP Analytics Cloud Planning Module Experience    Experience in connecting various on premise and cloud database with Analytics cloud   Experience in creation of Stories Hierarchies, Dashboards, Geo Maps, Linked Analysis   Exposure to dimension and model level permission   Some level of knowledge or experience in creating smart discoveries and machine learning scenarios would be an added advantage   Good knowledge of visualization concept of reporting   Experience and good knowledge on another other Visualization Dashboarding tool   Great communication client facing skills.        Information Security Responsibilities:     Understand and adhere to Information Security policies, guidelines and procedure, practice them for protection of organizational data and Information System.   Take part in information security training and act while handling information.   Report all suspected security and policy breach to Infosec team or appropriate authority(CISO).   Understand and adhere to the additional information security responsibilities as part of the assigned job role.
